Loved loved loved it.  Absolutely fantastic food.  Friendly waitstaff.  We have been eating all over Barcelona at a lot of different highly recommended places and the food here was some of the absolutely very best we had.  This place is not cheap but the quality of the food and the cooking makes it worth every dime.  Order the papas bravas - easily the very best I have had anywhere in Spain - and the Sepietas salteadas en su tinta.
